quotes.quote: All teenage girls like to look good and tennis players are no different.
Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
It has been said that democracy is the worst form of government except all the others that have been tried.
Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
The spirit of democracy is not a mechanical thing to be adjusted by abolition of forms. It requires change of heart.
Democracy passes into despotism.

Our great democracies still tend to think that a stupid man is more likely to be honest than a clever man, and our politicians take advantage of this prejudice by pretending to be even more stupid than nature made them
The end may justify the means as long as there is something that justifies the end
Democracy is a device that ensures we shall be governed no better than we deserve
Democracy is the theory that the common people know what they want and deserve to get it good and hard.
As I would not be a slave, so I would not be a master. This expresses my idea of democracy.
Democracy works when people claim it as their own.

The strongest democracies flourish from frequent and lively debate, but they endure when people of every background and belief find a way to set aside smaller differences in service of a greater purpose.
Democracy is the road to socialism.
The many are more incorruptible than the few; they are like the greater quantity of water which is less easily corrupted than a little.
Democracy means that anyone can grow up to be president, and anyone who doesn't grow up can be vice president.
Democracy is a charming form of government, full of variety and disorder, and dispensing a sort of equality to equals and unequal alike.
Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.
No man is good enough to govern another man without that other's consent.
Democracy give every man the right to be his own oppressor.
Democracy means simply the bludgeoning of the people by the people for the people.
Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.
Democracy means government by discussion, but it is only effective if you can stop people talking.
Democracy without morality is impossible.

quotes.cite: Marquis de Flers Robert and Arman de Caillavet
quotes.quote: Democracy is the name we give the people whenever we need them.
The great thing about democracy is that it gives every voter a chance to do something stupid.
A government of the people, by the people, and for the people shall not perish from the earth.

These are the people we elected and if we are not satisfied we should get new candidates. It is in our hands. It is our country. It is a very simplistic view that politicians are to blame for everything.
A man will fight harder for his interests than for his rights.
